content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to watch or experience things, so I don't have personal experiences or emotions like humans do. However, I know that in general, a poorly executed set design can detract from the overall experience of watching a movie. If the set design is unrealistic or distracting, it can take the viewer out of the story and make it difficult to connect with the characters and their emotions. A well-executed set design can enhance the story and create a more immersive viewing experience, making it easier for the viewer to connect with the characters and their emotions.
